resources.name: /linux-desktop-slash-commands
resources.description: A library of slash commands intended specifically to facilitate common and advanced operations on Linux desktop environments (although many would also be useful on Linux servers). Command groups include hardware benchmarking, filesystem organisation, and security posture validation.
resources.author: Daniel Rosehill

resources.name: /analyze-issue
resources.description: Fetches GitHub issue details to create comprehensive implementation specifications, analyzing requirements and planning structured approach with clear implementation steps.
resources.author: jerseycheese

resources.name: /create-docs
resources.description: Analyzes code structure and purpose to create comprehensive documentation detailing inputs/outputs, behavior, user interaction flows, and edge cases with error handling.
resources.author: jerseycheese

resources.name: /build-react-app
resources.description: Builds React applications locally with intelligent error handling, creating specific tasks for build failures and providing appropriate server commands based on build results.
resources.author: wmjones

resources.name: /run-pre-commit
resources.description: Runs pre-commit checks with intelligent results handling, analyzing outputs, creating tasks for issue fixing, and integrating with task management systems.
resources.author: wmjones

resources.name: /do-issue
resources.description: Implements GitHub issues with manual review points, following a structured approach with issue number parameter and offering alternative automated mode for efficiency.
resources.author: jerseycheese

resources.name: /next-task
resources.description: Gets the next task from TaskMaster and creates a branch for it, integrating with task management systems, automating branch creation, and enforcing naming conventions.
resources.author: wmjones

resources.name: /act
resources.description: Generates React components with proper accessibility, creating ARIA-compliant components with keyboard navigation that follow React best practices and include comprehensive accessibility testing.
resources.author: sotayamashita

resources.name: /dump
resources.description: Dumps the current Claude Code conversation to a markdown file in `.claude/logs/` with timestamped files that include session details and preserve full conversation history.
resources.author: fumito-ito

resources.name: /five
resources.description: Applies the "five whys" methodology to perform root cause analysis, identify underlying issues, and create solution approaches for complex problems.
resources.author: TuckerTucker
